summary: With the help of his uncle, a man travels to the future to try and bring his girlfriend back to life.
cast: Harman Baweja|Priyanka Chopra|Boman Irani|Archana Puran Singh|Amman Batala|Matt Connelly|Matt Dean|Kurush Deboo|Leah Marie East|Candida Fernadies|Felix Harris-Evans|Hartley Jackson|Karan Veer Mehra|Victoria Morgan|Mike Rann|Mehezabeen Sarela|Dalip Tahil|Rachit Trehan|Harsh Vashisht|Sarika Young
title: Love Story 2050
